items.name: pyATS
items.description: Cisco pyATS is a Network Test and Automation Solution with a closed-source core and open-source extensions. The core framework is available in binary format, while related packages like Unicon plugins are fully open source.

items.name: torero.dev
items.description: Closed source with restrictive EULA, proprietary network automation tool to launch python and ansible playbooks, I have no idea who would want this.
